segment.source: Windows® Setup is the program that installs Windows or upgrades an existing Windows installation.
segment.target: Windows® Setup is the program that installs Windows or upgrades an existing Windows installation.

segment.source: It is also the basis for the following installation and upgrade methods:
segment.target: It is also the basis for the following installation and upgrade methods:

segment.source: Windows Setup can perform both clean and upgrade installations.
segment.target: Windows Setup can perform both clean and upgrade installations.

segment.source: However, it does not perform computer-to-computer migrations.
segment.target: However, it does not perform computer-to-computer migrations.

segment.source: Instead, you must use Windows Easy Transfer, the User State Migration Tool (USMT), or another migration tool to move data from a previous installation to the new operating system.
segment.target: Instead, you must use Windows Easy Transfer, the User State Migration Tool (USMT), or another migration tool to move data from a previous installation to the new operating system.

segment.source: Windows Setup can perform a custom installation, also known as a clean installation, which saves your previous Windows installation but does not migrate your settings.
segment.target: Windows Setup can perform a custom installation, also known as a clean installation, which saves your previous Windows installation but does not migrate your settings.

segment.source: The previous Windows installation will not boot after a clean installation.
segment.target: The previous Windows installation will not boot after a clean installation.

segment.source: Windows Setup can perform an installation that retains your settings and preferences while upgrading your operating system.
segment.target: Windows Setup can perform an installation that retains your settings and preferences while upgrading your operating system.

segment.source: The Windows Setup program starts and restarts the computer, gathers information, copies files, and creates or adjusts configuration settings.
segment.target: The Windows Setup program starts and restarts the computer, gathers information, copies files, and creates or adjusts configuration settings.

segment.source: The following table shows the overall process for Windows Setup:
segment.target: The following table shows the overall process for Windows Setup:

segment.source: Windows PE (for booting the Windows DVD or booting a custom Windows PE image)
segment.target: Windows PE (for booting the Windows DVD or booting a custom Windows PE image)

segment.source: Specify Windows Setup configurations by using either the Windows Setup dialog boxes (interactive) or an answer file (unattended), or a combination of the two.
segment.target: Specify Windows Setup configurations by using either the Windows Setup dialog boxes (interactive) or an answer file (unattended), or a combination of the two.

segment.source: Windows Setup configurations include adding a product key and configuring a disk.
segment.target: Windows Setup configurations include adding a product key and configuring a disk.

segment.source: Apply answer file settings in the windowsPE configuration pass to configure the installation behavior and user experience.
segment.target: Apply answer file settings in the windowsPE configuration pass to configure the installation behavior and user experience.

segment.source: Copy the Windows image to the disk.
segment.target: Copy the Windows image to the disk.

segment.source: Process answer file settings in the offlineServicing configuration pass.
segment.target: Process answer file settings in the offlineServicing configuration pass.

segment.source: The settings are applied to the Windows image before that Windows image boots.
segment.target: The settings are applied to the Windows image before that Windows image boots.

segment.source: When the computer first boots, any optional components, drivers, updates, or language packs are processed.
segment.target: When the computer first boots, any optional components, drivers, updates, or language packs are processed.

segment.source: Create specific configurations, making the Windows installation unique.
segment.target: Create specific configurations, making the Windows installation unique.

segment.source: Apply answer file settings in the oobeSystem configuration pass.
segment.target: Apply answer file settings in the oobeSystem configuration pass.

segment.source: Apply content file settings from the Oobe.xml file.
segment.target: Apply content file settings from the Oobe.xml file.

segment.source: Windows Setup Scenarios and Best Practices
segment.target: Windows Setup Scenarios and Best Practices

segment.source: Windows Setup Supported Platforms and Cross-Platform Deployments
segment.target: Windows Setup Supported Platforms and Cross-Platform Deployments
